comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text: The flag arrays certRev_PKIX_Verify_Nist_Policy_LeafFlags, et al. and CERTRevocationTests::cert_rev_flags_per_method should be marked const. Otherwise, an application may unintentionally make modifications to these global flags that comprise part of the predefined validation policies, and other parts of the application that depend on the predefined certificate policies will get unexpected results.
